data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 4,059,576 lost in Izmir that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Izmir, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Izmir.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Izmir, Turkey know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Izmir, Turkey.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Abaza people.
the state of Izmir has (about) 1,524 people who know Jesus, 22,735 people who know about him culturally, and 4,036,841 people who are far from Jesus.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,524 believers in Izmir, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Izmir, Turkey has a population of 4,061,100.

We estimate Izmir has 1,524 people who might know Jesus, 22,735 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,036,841 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,664 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Izmir, Turkey humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Izmir
